main event: A round reddish white object was sighted flying in straight level flight in Battlecreek, Michigan on 8 January 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes., The object was observed at 40° elevation and 150° azimuth., It moved in a southeast direction., Two military aircraft were reported in the area at the time., The case was classified as insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: one round reddish white object in the sky
